resume.title: Mohit
resume.objectives: Seeking winter internship during December 2016 (15th Dec to Jan 8th) in the Business industry which is in line with my passion and my educational course in Northeastern University. Currently a Mechanical Engineer, but I intend to switch to Business Management. Taking accounting, International Business and Economics courses. Eager to learn and explore opportunities within sales, management and marketing verticals in your organization.

work_experience.job: Format the paragraph. Remove the pointersBhartiBharti Airtel Singapore Pte Ltd. Intern June 2014 ♣ Customer prospecting, collaborated with Sales team to reach out and formulate a database of prospective customers. Tasked to gain insights into market trends and provide feedback to Sales team ♣ Reported directly to the Regional Sales Director of Bharti Singapore ♣ Reference: Narendran Dhanaram (d.narendran@airtel.com)

qualifications.education: Add Education headerNortheastern University Boston Class of 2019 - Mechanical Engineering (Currently a Sophomore) Canadian International School Singapore Class of 2015 - International Baccalaureate
qualifications.additional_information: Add Addiotional Information header or else the following points look out of place.Experience in MS Suite and 3D modeling Software (AutoCAD and Solidworks).
Fluent in English, French and Hindi
Prior leadership roles in journalism, sports teams and outreach events
Basic understanding of Accounting, Economic and Business principles
Expertise in presentations and proficient written and verbal communication skills
Prior teaching experience, Teaching Assistant at Canadian International School Singapore (Math and Art)
Volunteered at St Joseph’s Nursing Home Singapore, worked in philanthropy activities and charity drives
Student athlete, several awards in Basketball, Soccer and Track and Field

report.p: You have written your resume very well. You have covered all the aspects that were enlisted in the schema document and have tried to make the resume look professional. However, there are some problems. Your qualification paragraph isn’t formatted properly. There are bullet points in between the paragraphs which makes it look untidy. Furthermore, there isn’t a header for the Education paragraph. Also there is a blank pointer between your education paragraph and what I think is supposed to be additional information. You do not have an Additional Information tag which makes the resume looks unprofessional. On the other hand, your resume is written in a very formal tone and has good use of vocabulary. The structure of the resume in terms of listing the different elements in a particular order is spot on. You’ve a ton of good points. Your objective paragraph is very descriptive and informative. Lastly your work experience has all the necessary information like duration and job summary included in it. One thing I advise you to focus on is formatting the resume. Once you rectify the formatting error, your resume will look much more professional. Nevertheless, I think you’ve a pretty strong resume and have done a fairly good job of representing yourself
